mapper.select: select course.id as id, course.coursename as coursename, major_id as majorId, major.majorname as majorName, course.admin_id as adminId, course_user.user_id as uid, user.username as username, role.id as rid, role.nameZh as roleNameZh from course left join major on course.major_id = major.id left join course_user on course.id = course_user.course_id left join user on user.id = course_user.user_id left join user_role on user.id = user_role.uid left join role on user_role.rid = role.id where course.admin_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into course(coursename, major_id, admin_id) values (#{courseName}, #{majorId}, #{adminId})
mapper.select: select count(knowledge_points.course_id) as knowledgePointsSumCount, count(knowledge_points.ppt_first_draft_at) as pptFirstDraftCompleteCount, count(knowledge_points.ppt_finalization_at) as pptFinalizationCompleteCount, count(knowledge_points.video_first_draft_at) as videoFirstDraftCompleteCount, count(knowledge_points.video_finalization_at) as videoFinalizationCompleteCount, count(knowledge_points.video_upload_at) as videoUploadCompleteCount from knowledge_points where knowledge_points.course_id=#{courseId}
select * from course_user where course_id=#{courseId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from course_user where user_id=#{userId} and course_id=#{courseId}
